alert.note: Alert for Davison; Douglas; Hanson; Hutchinson; McCook; Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:08AM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph by Friday afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Minnesota and south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could become difficult to impossible by Friday afternoon. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Davison; Douglas; Hanson; Hutchinson; McCook; Minnehaha
